content: उपसेव् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To serve, worship, honour; <ls>Ms. 4. 133.</ls> {@--2@} To practise, follow, pursue, cultivate; as a vow. {@--3@} To make use of. {@--4@} To be addicted to, enjoy; <ls>Bg. 15. 9</ls>; so सुखं, संधिं, विग्रहं &c. {@--5@} To frequent, inhabit. {@--6@} To rub or anoint with (sandal &c.).
